visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The x-axis should display months with reversed order, and the y-axis should also be reversed. The chart should have a dark background with white text for labels and titles. The data series should represent the average temperature for each month, with the series name 'Temperature'. The chart should have a legend positioned at the bottom of the chart.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts configuration is designed to render a spline chart with specific styling and data presentation. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the title is 'Monthly Average Temperature'. Both the x-axis and y-axis are reversed, with the x-axis displaying months in reverse order and the y-axis representing temperature values in reverse order. The chart has a dark background color (#2c3e50) with white text for all labels and titles, ensuring readability against the dark background. The data series represents the average temperature for each month, with the series name 'Temperature'. The legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart, centered horizontally, and styled with white text. The overall design aims to provide a clear and visually appealing representation of the monthly temperature data.
